{G}: Target renowned creature is no longer renowned.

When R Gravecast enters, if it was cast, search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.
{R}, Sacrifice R Gravecast: Add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast spells from graveyards.

This spell costs {2} more to cast from your sanctum.
Incant 4 [i](At verse 4+, reset it to cast this spell from your sanctum. If you have no verse, start it at 1. Increase it once on each of your turns by casting an instant or sorcery.)[/i]
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

When I Clues enters, if {I} was spent to cast this spell, mirror. [i](Create a token that's a copy of a token you control.)[/i]
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a token: You draw a card and lose 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery.

When W Wide enters, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Spirit enchantment creature token.
• Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.
{3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
When you sacrifice a clue, Clue gets +2/+2. This ability only triggers once.

Enchantments you control have healing 1.
Artifacts you control have ward {1}.
Disturb {4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you discard one or more cards, Discard gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Incant 2 [i](At verse 2+, reset it to cast this spell from your sanctum. If you have no verse, start it at 1. Increase it once on each of your turns by casting an instant or sorcery.)[/i]
Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+0, gains trample, and must be blocked if able.
Whenever an enchantment enters under your control you may sanctify Enchantment Bait from your graveyard. [i](Put it into its owner's sanctum.)[/i]

Return target green or Forest card from your graveyard to your hand.

As UI08 Ixikite enters, choose a creature.
The chosen creature has size 2/2 and has no abilities.
UI08 Ixikite gets +1/+1 for each creature on the battlefield without abilities.

Target opponent mills thirteen cards.
